ee.ria.DigiDoc.crypto

Interface DecryptToken


  • public interface DecryptToken
    Handles the actual decryption. Has to be provided when calling CryptoContainer.decrypt(DecryptToken, Certificate, String, File).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] pin1, byte[] data, boolean ecc)
      Perform the actual decryption.

    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] pin1,
               byte[] data,
               boolean ecc)
        throws CryptoException
        Perform the actual decryption.
        Parameters:
        pin1 - PIN1 code.
        data - Data to sign.
        ecc - Whether it is an elliptic curve certificate.
        Returns:
        Decrypted data.
        Throws:
        Pin1InvalidException - When PIN1 verification fails.
        CryptoException - When something besides PIN1 verification fails.
